channel.title: [WIP] Gun
channel.description:
Sorry i havent posted in a while, Just havent been bothered to model, But seening as the model section has died of the last few days ( yep i still look at peoples work (: ) i thought i would model something for the forums, so this is what i have. its 5 primitives, and 1209 polygons, i think its rather nice, i know there are some edges that need to be fixed, but it is a WIP.
Render. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r5cIU.png[/img]
Wireframe. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/O9o5w.png[/img]
rate and comment (:

item.title: [WIP] Gun
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Strangle:

The trigger was just place there, because i can. and your not gonna see it ever used, I have an internal slide, and as cole said, The grip is away from the Red laser attachment. As with the Silencer, i like it that way, When actually render, It looks smooth.

The hell is an internal slide?

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Gun
item.dc:creator: @Strangle Strangle
item.description:
@Strangle wrote:

The trigger was just place there, because i can. and your not gonna see it ever used, I have an internal slide, and as cole said, The grip is away from the Red laser attachment. As with the Silencer, i like it that way, When actually render, It looks smooth.

item.title: [WIP] Gun
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

m.dog311:

Why is there an open space between the top of the trigger guard and the bottom of the barrel/slide? The hammer doesn’t look like a hammer at all, and that grip looks uncomfortable as fuck. I’ve also never seen a handgun with the trigger that far back in. The silencer on the end of the barrel is pretty shitty too. Silencers are almost always a smooth cylinder the same size the hole way through, and if anything, smaller at the end. I also don’t see how your handgun plans on ejecting shot shells Also, the magazines tend not to sit flush with the bottom of the gun.

I think that open space separates the trigger guard-thing from the laser light.

Read full topic
